user_timeline.tweet: Thanks for all the #AskAndy questions! Just about to take over @FIFAcom so stay tuned for the Q&A!
On 11 Dec I'll be talking football on @FIFAcom. Tweet any questions to me @Andy_Murray by 9 Dec, don't forget #AskAndy http://t.co/QwRP5xcT
#sarcasm
Been any exciting footy games over the last few days?
@AlexCorretja74 great to see spanish davis cup captain alex corretja in paris, one of the nicest guys you will meet #meboy
First match in paris tonight vs mathieu at 730 local time, pumped for it #happyhalloween
@tomncollier its normally the best physically or tactically that wins the race
@tomncollier of course there is skill at the top end of all sports but in cycling it isn't the decisive factor in winning or losing
@mr_rossi_ sport now... And its up to the others to follow
@mr_rossi_ I agree if you read 2 lines of a 2 minute answer I gave it doesn't sound good. Cycling has the best anti doping programme in..
@mr_rossi_ maybe you can help me here? Do all cyclists have daily coaching on technique etc?
@mr_rossi_ I'm very aware of the skill and physical endurance required to be a top cyclist..Very very tough sport one of the toughest
@SimonWilliams21 was asked to compare 2 sports... I believe one is much more physically demanding and the other is more skillfully demanding
@SimonWilliams21 cycling one of the most physically demanding sports in the world... What did I say about drugs that was incorrect?
First games of @NBA season tonight...good luck @MiamiHEAT vs boston #defendingchamps
@MTBTR good idea:) could raise some money for bio passports across more sport!
@MTBTR knowing if any little choice of the wrong word or phrase will make you look like an idiot
@MTBTR I wasn't trying to say anything bad about cycling.. I was trying to compare the 2 sports in front of journalists which isn't easy!
@MTBTR I don't think it is "just" physical as I'm sure I would hit the deck cycling at 60mph however I believe it is a very large part of it
@MTBTR ideally every sport would have a bio passport....
@MTBTR so no sport requires more or less skill than another one? And no sport is more or less physical than another?
@MTBTR didn't doubt for one second that the testing in cycling is better than tennis.. I said there needs to be much more testing in tennis
@MTBTR however I believe there is more skill involved in tennis...and I said that there needs to be much more testing in tennis...
@MTBTR long distance cycling is physically one of the hardest sports out there.. Without doubt more demanding than tennis...
@MTBTR exactly what did I say that was bullshit?
@Becker_Boris hahaha did you try fitting in the lockers back in ur day too?
